title: Ex-Taliban embrace iPhone

content: They're probably wondering how they were able to shrink down and fit all those musicians and their instruments inside such a small device when it plays music.
reply: They're probably wondering how they were able to shrink down and fit all those musicians and their instruments inside such a small device when it plays music.
title: Ex-Taliban embrace iPhone

content: quote: Originally posted by mrmixitup: They're probably wondering how they were able to shrink down and fit all those musicians and their instruments inside such a small device when it plays music. The folk in that region haven't been shy about embracing western technology. They've been copying western patterns for centuries,and using them when necessary to perform the traditional Afghan colonic welcoming rite. Remember when they threatened to shut down the cell phone system last year, unless the government stopped trying to listen in on their communications? Think they don't do sigint, or know they're being monitored too?
quote: Originally posted by mrmixitup: They're probably wondering how they were able to shrink down and fit all those musicians and their instruments inside such a small device when it plays music.
